statements: DELETE FROM DiseaseData WHERE outbreak_date = '2022-01-15' AND prevalence_rate > 0.5;
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Cancer Study';
DELETE FROM disease_prevalence WHERE disease_id = 1 AND prevalence_rate > 2.5;
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE research_date < '2022-01-01' AND research_topic = 'Cancer Research';
DELETE FROM outbreaks WHERE location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM outbreaks WHERE location = 'New York' AND outbreak_date > '2022-01-01';
